hrm_beats module¶

hrm_beats.hrm_beats(peak, metrics)¶

Record time of each Rpeak, store into list and save into metrics dictionary

Parameters:
  • peak (ndarry(dtype=float, ndim=2)) – [[time, voltage]] Array containing the peak voltage and related time
  • metrics (dict) – “mean_hr_bpm”: float “voltage_extremes”: tuple “duration”: float “num_beats”: int “beats”: list dictionary used to store metrics of ECG data
Returns:

  • metrics (dict)
  • same dictionary as in parameters with updated “beats” entry

bme590hrm
